meanings.definition: Cosmeceuticals: products that combine cosmetic and pharmaceutical properties
meanings.sent1: I bought some cosmeceuticals to improve my skin.
meanings.sent2: The cosmeceuticals on the shelf promised to enhance beauty.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cosmeceuticals were like magic potions.
meanings.sent4: The cosmeceuticals worked like a charm, transforming her appearance.
meanings.sent5: The cosmeceuticals were like a blend of science and beauty in a bottle.

meanings.definition: Cosmeceuticals: relating to products that improve skin health and appearance
meanings.sent1: Her skincare routine included cosmeceuticals for glowing skin.
meanings.sent2: The cosmeceuticals industry is booming with innovative products.
meanings.sent3: He found the idea of cosmeceuticals fascinating and beneficial.
meanings.sent4: The cosmeceuticals effect on her complexion was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: Using cosmeceuticals daily made her skin radiant and healthy.
